title: Subject: Safety Circular â€“ Platform Edges After Rainfall
summary_sentences: Subject: Safety Circular â€“ Platform Edges After Rainfall
CRS has advised additional caution for slippery conditions at platform edges following heavy rainfall events.
Station controllers should ensure that safety announcements are made every 15 minutes during rain.
- Shift in-charge shall brief all staff before duty start.
- Immediate placement of caution boards on affected platforms.
action_items: CRS has advised additional caution for slippery conditions at platform edges following heavy rainfall events. Station controllers should ensure that safety announcements are made every 15 minutes during rain.
- Shift in-charge shall brief all staff before duty start.
- Compliance report to be submitted within 24 hours.
